entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
